sentence.Network_en: The young wheat shone silkily in the sunshine.
sentence.Network_cn: 小麦的幼苗在阳光下显得柔软而光洁.

auth_sentence.content: Depending on whether it's woven from bamboo, acacia, raffia or hemp, it can speak roughly or silkily.
auth_sentence.res_content: Depending on whether it's woven from bamboo, acacia, raffia or hemp, it can speak roughly or silkily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Depending on whether it's woven from bamboo, acacia, raffia or hemp, it can speak roughly or silkily.

auth_sentence.content: It was a small, silent room, all dark wood that gleamed silkily in the parchment-yellow light.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a small, silent room, all dark wood that gleamed silkily in the parchment-yellow light.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a small, silent room, all dark wood that gleamed silkily in the parchment-yellow light.

baesInfo.ciba_translate_msg: 以上结果来自机器翻译。
